meanings.definition: A woman who performs in plays, movies, or television shows.
meanings.sent1: The talented actress captivated the audience with her performance.
meanings.sent2: She dreams of becoming a famous actress one day.
meanings.sent3: The actress tripped on stage, but gracefully turned it into part of the act.
meanings.sent4: Her life was a stage, and she the leading actress in her own drama.
meanings.sent5: The actress's emotions shone through in every scene she played.

meanings.definition: To perform as an actress in a play, movie, or television show.
meanings.sent1: She will actress in the upcoming movie.
meanings.sent2: Actressing requires a lot of dedication and practice.
meanings.sent3: He decided to actress for the school play on a whim.
meanings.sent4: She actressed beautifully in the romantic comedy.
meanings.sent5: The young girl loved to actress in front of her family.
